channel.title: How do I get a client?
channel.description:
So, I like having the 508, and I noticed that the source i'm using does not have a client *cough* Allstarscape *cough*
Is there a client that would work with any source, or one that would work with mine?

item.title: How do I get a client?
item.dc:creator: @IconsOfEvil IconsOfEvil
item.description:
@IconsOfEvil wrote:

How’d you get that idea? XD
Thanks.
Whoa, Whoa, What do I do with the Cache?

I’m sorry, I’ve never done Clients, only servers.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get a client?
